sentences.sentence: He recommended monotheism but believed in reincarnation.
sentences.translation: 他宣传一神论，却相信转世再生。

sentences.sentence: We are acquiring an understanding of the history of monotheism .
sentences.translation: 我们最近在了解“一神教”的历史。

sentences.sentence: Gods start to take on a human form, so monotheism appears around this time.
sentences.translation: 神灵开始人形化，于是一神教就在这个时候出现了。
